metadata.title: AKS ConfigMap or Secret Enumeration
metadata.description: Detects enumeration of secrets and configmaps across namespaces.

properties.description: Detects when a user lists secrets or configmaps across multiple namespaces, indicating potential credential harvesting.
properties.query:
let EnumerationThreshold = 5;
let TimeWindow = 5m;
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeWindow)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend user = log.user
| extend sourceIPs = log.sourceIPs
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where objectRef.resource in ("secrets", "configmaps")
| where verb in ("list", "get")
| where responseStatus.code == 200
| extend
    ResourceType = tostring(objectRef.resource),
    ResourceName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    SourceIP = tostring(sourceIPs[0]),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where not(Username startswith "system:")
| summarize
    AccessCount = count(),
    NamespacesAccessed = dcount(Namespace),
    ResourcesAccessed = dcount(ResourceName),
    Namespaces = make_set(Namespace, 50),
    Resources = make_set(ResourceName, 50),
    ResourceTypes = make_set(ResourceType, 5)
    by ClusterName, Username, SourceIP, bin(TimeGenerated, TimeWindow)
| where NamespacesAccessed >= EnumerationThreshold or ResourcesAccessed >= 20
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Username,
    SourceIP,
    AccessCount,
    NamespacesAccessed,
    ResourcesAccessed,
    Namespaces,
    ResourceTypes

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: User '{{Username}}' enumerated {{ResourcesAccessed}} resources across {{NamespacesAccessed}} namespaces from IP {{SourceIP}}.
